testcase.classname: Login to the Free CRM application
testcase.name: Sucessfully Login to the Free CRM Application
testcase.system-out: Given User Should be on the Login Screen....................................passed When User enter the Username and Password and Clicks on the Login Button....passed Then User Should Sucessfully Navigated to the Free CRM Home Screen..........passed And User Should validate the HomeScreen Title and the Login User............passed And close the Browser.......................................................passed
